metadata.title: CVE-2024-0582 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A memory leak flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s io_uring functionalityin how a user registers a buffer ring with IORING_REGISTER_PBUF_RING,mmap() it, and then frees it. This flaw allows a local user to crash orpotentially escalate their privileges on the system.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-0582` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-11-generic - 6.8.0-11.11
